content: Prioritize accuracy, clarity, eloquence, and brevity. Ask questions and suggest interesting ideas when appropriate.

all minivans are vehicles
all desks are furniture 
all leprechauns are mythical creatures
all onesies are clothing
all dolphins are whales
all ice cream is dessert
all nose rings are piercings
all moths are insects 
all whales are mammals 
all bacon is meat
all vuvuzelas are horns
all violins are string instruments 
all zombies are undead
all jeggings are pants
all crows are birds
all labradoodles are dogs
all kazoos are instruments
all tuxedos are suits
all poodles are dogs 
all memes are jokes
all trampolines are bouncy
all squares are rectangles
all daisies are flowers 
all elbows are joints 
all thumbs are fingers
all laptops are computers 
all carrots are vegetables 
all beaches are natural wonders 
all bracelets are jewelry 
all books are literature 
all apples are fruit 
all cellphones are electronic devices 
all sunglasses are eyewear 
all monarchs are rulers 
all planets are celestial bodies 
all clowns are entertainers 
all bicycles are vehicles 
all maps are representations of geography 
all diamonds are gems 
all galaxies are cosmic structures 
all hammocks are types of sleeping apparatus 
all umbrellas are objects for coverage from the rain 
all pancakes are breakfast food 
all sunglasses are eyewear 
all clams are seafood 
all lamps are light sources 
all coffee is a beverage 
all hats are head coverings 
all jeans are pants 
all chairs are furniture 
all clouds are weather patterns 
all guitar strings are musical equipment 
all cats are animals 
all poppies are flowers 
all skeletons are animal structures

identify duplicate words

- all dolphins are whales
- all sunglasses are eyewear
- all jeggings are pants
- all dogs poodles are dogs
- all thumbs are fingers

flowers is a duplicate word (daisies/poppies)
find more duplicates like that

- all sunglasses are eyewear
- all jeggings are pants
- all dogs poodles are dogs
- flowers (daisies/poppies)
- all chairs are furniture
- all bacon is meat
